rooms.description: Large welcoming area with traditional Kerala motifs; provides natural ventilation and lighting, aligning with Vastu principles for auspicious entry.
Spacious room with a central fireplace designed in Kerala style, complemented by handcrafted wooden furniture. Openings to the courtyard to enhance natural light.
Adjacent to the living room; features traditional tiled flooring and locally sourced materials, offering views of the landscaped exterior. Vastu guidelines ensure balanced energy flow.
Modern Kerala kitchen designed with a blend of traditional and luxury finishes. Natural ventilation via ventilators near windows adheres to Vastu principles.
Well-planned ensuite bathroom connected to the living space, featuring water-efficient fixtures and traditional Kerala stone tiles.

Luxury home theater with acoustic optimization, ambient lighting, and comfortable seating arrangements. Walls are lined with traditional Kerala-inspired decor to integrate luxury with tradition.
